awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: Dorothy Parker remembers the heyday of the Algonquin Round Table, a circle of friends whose barbed wit, like hers, was fueled by alcohol and flirted with despair.
plot: Dorothy Parker remembers the heyday of the Algonquin Round Table, a circle of friends whose barbed wit, like hers, was fueled by alcohol and flirted with despair.
title: Mrs. Parker and the Vicious Circle
